name: Midnight Delivery
description:
Midnight Delivery is a maze based, horror game with an emphasise on finding the most optimum route and speedrunning deliveries.

Hello there and welcome to your new job at PizzA! The cities premium provider of 100% real pizza. You have been assigned to work at one of our older locations in a community center. The place is a bit confusing and mostly abandoned, but we have an AMAZING rent deal so we mostly just use it as a delivery only place! Remember to work hard and smile when someone asks what the pizzas are made of.

Batteries can be replaced free of charge at designated PizzA charging stations! Look for a blue light.

Please note that this is an early, work in progress build of the game. Some things might not look very good and sounds are basic.
